articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: T20 World Cup moved away from India to UAE and Oman due to Covid - The Guardian
articles.description: The second wave of the virus in India has forced the ICC to take action but the BCCI will still host the tournament
articles.content:
The International Cricket Council has moved the Twenty20 World Cup from India to the United Arab Emirates and Oman because of the pandemic.
India will remain the host of the event scheduled from 17 … [+2816 chars]
